modules.name: Shifty
modules.description: Gate shift register with controllable delays. Create generative gate sequences from a single clock.

modules.name: IceTray
modules.description: Speed shifter and tape delay with selective memory. Perform into this and it will never forget your mistakes.

modules.name: AstroVibe
modules.description: Three stereo oscillators or LFOs with random waveforms. Explore a universe of unique waveforms.

modules.name: GlassPane
modules.description: Patchable, branchable, network sequencer. Create a cascading intricate self modulating sequence.

modules.name: ShiftyExpander
modules.description: Expander for Shifty. Adds CV and Atenuverters for all the knobs on Shifty.

modules.name: Nudge
modules.description: Modulation generator that lets you randomly nudge the modulations whenever you want.

modules.name: OneShot
modules.description: One-shot Sequencer that can be daisy-chained with other sequencers or more OneShots.
